Text: who the hell is this god person these cultist keep yapping about ?

ahhh the fallacy of the "greater than" is so broken.  If a house needs an engineer to be built, and humans need a god to built, then allah must need another god to build it, ad infinitum.  

The Universe doesn't need a god, it is consistent and beautiful as it is.  The idea of allah just creates inconsistencies.
